name: Forgotten Heroes
shortDescription: Fast-paced 2D side-scrolling military shooter with multiplayer battles and weapon upgrades.
fullDescription:
Forgotten Heroes is an action-packed 2D side-scrolling shooter set in a dynamic military world. Engage in fast-paced multiplayer battles and dominate the battlefield with strategic upgrades and class-based combat.

Key Features:

  • Class-Based Combat: Pick your soldier class—Scout, Assault, Juggernaut, or Support—to match your playstyle.
  • Weapon Upgrade System: Enhance your arsenal with upgrades for Damage, Fire Rate, Accuracy, and Ammo, featuring weapons like the SPAS shotgun.
  • Multiplayer Battles: Team up and compete in real-time, with instant notifications for kills and joins (e.g., 'You Killed Don', 'Ricardo Joined').
  • Dynamic 2D Environments: Fight across diverse levels with interactive terrain and structures for tactical gameplay.
